title: Multiple Counter
summary: Take control of counters with your voice!
description: With Multiple Counter application you can have multiple counters simultaneously. Now you can control with your voice! Shake your phone and say "new counter". You can also add or subtract from existing counters only with your voice. Do you have a TV with Chromecast? Make the most most from Multiple Counter with it, put your counters on TV!Bring the counters on your wrist with Android Wear.Examples of use:-      It never has been easier to keep track of scores in games. Also, you can put scores on TV with your Chromecast for everyone to see it.-      Do not lose the account of repetitions of the exercises you do in the gym.-      Keep track of the chapters of your series-      You know your teacher repeats the same word countless times and want to keep score Multiple Counter help you!Is Multiple Counter in your language? Do you want to help translate? Send an email to apps@kpb.es
descriptionHTML:
With Multiple Counter application you can have multiple counters simultaneously. Now you can control with your voice! Shake your phone and say "new counter". You can also add or subtract from existing counters only with your voice. Do you have a TV with Chromecast? Make the most most from Multiple Counter with it, put your counters on TV!
Bring the counters on your wrist with Android Wear.

Examples of use:
- It never has been easier to keep track of scores in games. Also, you can put scores on TV with your Chromecast for everyone to see it.
- Do not lose the account of repetitions of the exercises you do in the gym.
- Keep track of the chapters of your series
- You know your teacher repeats the same word countless times and want to keep score Multiple Counter help you!

Is Multiple Counter in your language? Do you want to help translate? Send an email to apps@kpb.es
comments: It works with Android Wear 2.0 and its so awesome! Seemless and reliable. Great job! Keep it up!
Super useful for tracking a few things
Voice function doesn't function...nothing really to make it stand out from every other counter
If it can't auto reset by day or week, it is a useless counter.
Does as it says. Really well. Is better than other counters and tally's back. Despite have ads that aren't too big, would be great if with a donations can be removed. Great app, deserves 5 stars.
